description: Position of first occurrence of n in continued fraction for Copeland-Erdős constant.
comments: This version uses an incorrect c.f. term indexing of [a_1; a_2, ...] instead of [a_0; a_1, ...]; see A224891 for correctly indexed version.
links: Klaus Brockhaus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Copeland-Erdős Constant Continued Fraction
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
